quotes: Dogs do speak, but only to those who know how to listen... or have treats.
Whoever said you can't buy happiness forgot about puppies... and bacon-flavored toys!
The road to my heart is paved with paw prints... and maybe a few muddy tracks.
Life is better with a furry companion... and a vacuum cleaner with strong suction.
Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole... and a lot furrier.
The more I learn about people, the more I like my dog... and the less I like my carpet.
A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself... and that squirrel over there.
Happiness is a warm puppy... and a cold nose nudging you at 5 AM.
Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole... and our sofas a lot hairier.
The best therapist has fur and four legs... and a penchant for chewing shoes.
I'm here to chew bubblegum and hate cats... and I'm all out of bubblegum.
Why chase your tail when you can chase the mailman?
I asked my dog if it's a cat person, it said 'I prefer snacks'.
If my dog could talk, I'd never need to know what time it is... it's always snack time!
